generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and arrows, which is the primary surface for vehicle travel.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the left side of the road, bordered by a curb and trees.
- building: A large modern building with glass walls is visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the left side of the road and on the right side near the building.
- terrain: Grass and soil are visible along the right side of the road, near the railway tracks.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a silver car in the foreground and a black car further ahead.
- truck: A red truck is visible in the distance, behind the black car.
- bus: A blue tram (a type of train) is visible on the tracks to the right.
- train: The blue tram on the tracks is a type of train.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the road, including those supporting traffic lights and streetlights.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, above the road.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible in the distance, near the traffic light.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
